statements: INSERT INTO sustainable_farming_practices_info (id, practice_name, description, impact_on_environment, benefits_to_farmers) VALUES (1, 'Crop Rotation', 'Rotation of crops in a sequence to improve soil fertility and reduce pests.', 'Reduces soil erosion', 'Increases crop yield');

INSERT INTO sustainable_farming_practices_info (id, description, impact_on_environment, benefits_to_farmers, practice_name) VALUES (2, 'Integrated Pest Management', 'Combines biological, cultural, and chemical controls to manage pests.', 'Minimizes pesticide use', 'Enhances biodiversity');

INSERT INTO sustainable_farming_practices_info (id, practice_name, description, impact_on_environment, benefits_to_farmers) VALUES (3, 'Cover Cropping', 'Planting cover crops to prevent soil erosion and improve soil quality.', 'Enhances soil structure', 'Suppresses weeds');

INSERT INTO sustainable_farming_practices_info (id, practice_name, impact_on_environment, description, benefits_to_farmers) VALUES (4, 'Agroforestry', 'Integrating trees and crops to create a sustainable farming system.', 'Promotes biodiversity', 'Provides additional income');

INSERT INTO sustainable_farming_practices_info (id, practice_name, impact_on_environment, benefits_to_farmers, description) VALUES (5, 'Water Conservation Practices', 'Implementing techniques to reduce water usage and improve water quality.', 'Preserves water resources', 'Enhances soil moisture retention');

INSERT INTO sustainable_farming_practices_info (id, practice_name, description, impact_on_environment, benefits_to_farmers) VALUES (1, 'Crop Rotation', 'Rotating different crops in the same field over different seasons to improve soil health and yield.', 'Reduces soil erosion and nutrient depletion.', 'Increases soil fertility and crop yield.');

INSERT INTO sustainable_farming_practices_info (practice_name, description, benefits_to_farmers, impact_on_environment, id) VALUES ('Inter-cropping', 'Planting two or more crops in close proximity to each other to optimize land use and reduce pests.', 'Diversified income and reduced dependence on single crop.', 'Natural pest control and enhanced biodiversity.', 2);

INSERT INTO sustainable_farming_practices_info (id, description, practice_name, benefits_to_farmers, impact_on_environment) VALUES (3, 'Using natural predators like ladybugs to control pests instead of chemical pesticides.', 'Biological Control', 'Reduces chemical input costs and promotes ecosystem balance.', 'Minimizes chemical pollution and protects beneficial insects.');

INSERT INTO sustainable_farming_practices_info (impact_on_environment, id, benefits_to_farmers, practice_name, description) VALUES ('Manure Management', 4, 'Improves soil fertility and reduces waste.', 'Managing Organic Waste', 'Proper disposal of animal waste to prevent water contamination and odors.');

INSERT INTO sustainable_farming_practices_info (id, impact_on_environment, benefits_to_farmers, description, practice_name) VALUES (5, 'Conserves water resources and reduces soil erosion.', 'Water Conservation Practices', 'Implementing drip irrigation and rainwater harvesting techniques to optimize water usage.', 'Drip Irrigation');
